name: Enrique Delgado Montes
description:
'''Enrique Delgado Montes''' (March 14, 1939 in [[Lima]], [[Peru]] – March 21, 1996 in Lima) was a [[Peru]]vian singer/songwriter and guitarist.

His parents were Ruperto Delgado and Asunci√≥n Montes. His childhood was spent in Rimac District where he did his early studies.
